name: Channels
description:
Controls

A - D = Left- Right
W = Jump
E = Rewind
Q = Interact

You're a 19-year-old girl that gets stuck inside an old TV. Now you have to find a way to get out...

This is the 2nd game jam that i have done. My teammates are, Misenrol, Oh,Eggnog, and RFS. Which help tremendously toward making this a completed game with a story and everything.  The game is based around you getting stuck in a TV and you have to get out using various channels. 

Comment down below feedback on how we could get better.
